plugin.name: Aardwolf_Note_Mode
plugin.author: Fiendish and Cizra
plugin.purpose: Disables aliases/triggers/timers for the duration of note writing
plugin.description: Turns off all aliases, triggers and timers while in note writing mode.

muclient.script:
dofile (GetPluginInfo (GetPluginID(), 20) .. "telnet_options.lua") require "gmcphelper"
function OnPluginClose() OnPluginDisable() end
function OnPluginDisable() done_init = false toggleStuff(true) end
function OnPluginInstall() OnPluginEnable() end
function OnPluginEnable() if IsConnected() and not done_init then Send_GMCP_Packet("request char") done_init = true end end
function toggleStuff(on) if on then SetStatus(prev_status_msg or "") world.SetOption('enable_timers', 1) world.SetOption('enable_aliases', 1) world.SetOption('enable_triggers', 1) if IsConnected() then Send_GMCP_Packet("tags on") end previous_state = state else prev_status_msg = GetInfo(53) SetStatus("Note Mode: timers, aliases, and triggers are currently disabled") world.SetOption('enable_timers', 0) world.SetOption('enable_aliases', 0) world.SetOption('enable_triggers', 0) if IsConnected() then Send_GMCP_Packet("tags off") end previous_state = state end end
done_init = false function OnPluginBroadcast(msg, id, name, text) -- Look for GMCP handler. if (id == '3e7dedbe37e44942dd46d264') then if text == "char.status" then -- only watch for char.status.state change state = gmcp("char.status.state") if previous_state == "5" and state ~= "5" then toggleStuff(true) elseif previous_state ~= "5" and state == "5" then toggleStuff(false) end done_init = true elseif not done_init then done_init = true Send_GMCP_Packet("request char") end end end -- onpluginbroadcast
function getmemoryusage() collectgarbage('collect') return collectgarbage('count') end
